About Us

Your Reliable Partner for Memorable Journeys

Trekx Travels is your reliable partner for memorable journeys across India and abroad. We offer group departures, customized trips, corporate tours, and solo experiences across Manali, Jibhi, Kasol, Himachal, Uttarakhand, and Rajasthan.

Our packages include stay, food, transport, and guided tours, ensuring comfort and value at affordable prices. With a focus on safety, unique itineraries, and hassle-free planning, every trip becomes unforgettable.
